description: This file defines a jQuery plugin for creating and managing a crossword puzzle interface, including functions for building the puzzle grid, handling user input, navigation, and answer checking.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the crossword puzzle, setting up the grid, clues, and event handlers.

methods.name: calcCoords
methods.description: Calculates all coordinates for puzzle entries based on starting positions and orientations.

methods.name: buildTable
methods.description: Builds the HTML table grid for the crossword puzzle based on calculated rows and columns.

methods.name: buildEntries
methods.description: Populates the grid with input fields for each puzzle entry and assigns classes and labels.

methods.name: checkAnswer
methods.description: Checks if the current input matches the correct answer for the active entry.
